SEARCH
Package model

Class Book

java.lang.Object
model.BiblioProducts
model.Book
public class Book extends BiblioProducts
The Book class represents a book, which is a type of library product. It extends the BiblioProducts class and adds specific properties such as a short review, genre, and number of sold books.
